name: train set
description: battery-powered train with driver's cab and forward/reverse mode tracks made from European beech wood large set for a variety of creative layouts can be combined with other vehicle sets by Playtive Junior recommended ages: 3–8 years includes long life alkaline battery and instructions max. route length: 165.3" compatible with standard wooden train and road sets 70 pieces
longDescription:
• 70-piece set
  • battery-powered train with driver's cab and forward/reverse mode
  • tracks made from European beech wood
  • can be combined with other vehicle sets by Playtive Junior
  • compatible with standard wooden train and road sets
  • max. route length: 165.3"
  • large set for a variety of creative layouts
  • includes long life alkaline battery and instructions
  • recommended ages: 3 - 8 years
  • 3-year limited warranty
